= linkposts =

List of urls posted by an author.

== Parameters: ==

|| *Name*   || *Required* || *Description* ||
|| url      || required   || URL string for the author. ||
|| contains || optional   || Query string to filter results. ||

Accepts [ResListParameters List Parameters]

== Example: ==

{{{
http://otter.topsy.com/linkposts.json?url=http://twitter.com/barackobama
}}}

This will fetch links in json format posted by Barack Obama.
